meanings.def: connected with the control of your feelings, especially your desire to have sex
able to control the bladder and bowels
one of the large land masses of the earth such as Europe, Asia or Africa
examples: The police investigation spanned three continents.
across a continent They trekked 1  500 miles across the Australian continent in 1931.
on a continent the strongest earthquake ever recorded on the North American continent
He crossed a whole continent to find his family.
He journeyed across continents in his quest for adventure.
The evidence that the continents have drifted is overwhelming.
Wolves are still found on the continent of Europe.
the first railway to cross the North American continent

meanings.def: the main part of the continent of Europe, not including Britain or Ireland
examples: on the Continent They planned to spend the summer on the Continent.
